Show / Hide Table of Contents

    Class NPPNativeMethods.NPPi.FixedFilters

    Fixed filters perform linear filtering operations (i.e. convolutions) with predefined kernels of fixed sizes.

    Inheritance
    System.Object
    NPPNativeMethods.NPPi.FixedFilters
    Inherited Members
    System.Object.Equals(System.Object)
    System.Object.Equals(System.Object, System.Object)
    System.Object.GetHashCode()
    System.Object.GetType()
    System.Object.MemberwiseClone()
    System.Object.ReferenceEquals(System.Object, System.Object)
    System.Object.ToString()
    Namespace: ManagedCuda.NPP
    Assembly: NPP.dll
    Syntax
    public static class FixedFilters

    Methods

    nppiFilterGauss_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, MaskSize)

    Four channel 16-bit signed Gauss filter, ignoring alpha channel.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterGauss_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, MaskSize eMaskSize)

    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    nppiFilterGaussAdvanced_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, Int32, CUdeviceptr)

    Four channel 16-bit signed Gauss filter, ignoring alpha channel.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterGaussAdvanced_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, int nFilterTaps, CUdeviceptr pKernel)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    System.Int32 nFilterTaps

    The number of filter taps where nFilterTaps = 2 * ((int)((float)ceil(radius) + 0.5F) ) + 1.
    CUdeviceptr pKernel

    Pointer to an array of nFilterTaps kernel coefficients which sum to 1.0F.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterGaussAdvanced_16s_C1R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, Int32, CUdeviceptr)

    System.Int32 nFilterTaps

    The number of filter taps where nFilterTaps = 2 * ((int)((float)ceil(radius) + 0.5F) ) + 1.
    CUdeviceptr pKernel

    Pointer to an array of nFilterTaps kernel coefficients which sum to 1.0F.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterGaussAdvanced_32f_C3R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, Int32, CUdeviceptr)

    Three channel 32-bit floating-point Gauss filter.

    nppiFilterHighPassBorder_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, MaskSize, NppiBorderType)

    Four channel 16-bit signed high-pass filter, ignoring alpha channel.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterHighPassBorder_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiSize oSrcSize, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, MaskSize eMaskSize, NppiBorderType eBorderType)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSrcSize

    Source image width and height in pixels relative to pSrc.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    MaskSize eMaskSize

    Enumeration value specifying the mask size.
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterHighPassBorder_16s_C1R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, MaskSize, NppiBorderType)

    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSrcSize

    Source image width and height in pixels relative to pSrc.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    MaskSize eMaskSize

    Enumeration value specifying the mask size.
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    MaskSize eMaskSize

    Enumeration value specifying the mask size.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterLowPassBorder_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, MaskSize, NppiBorderType)

    Four channel 16-bit signed high-pass filter, ignoring alpha channel.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterLowPassBorder_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiSize oSrcSize, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, MaskSize eMaskSize, NppiBorderType eBorderType)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSrcSize

    Source image width and height in pixels relative to pSrc.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    MaskSize eMaskSize

    Enumeration value specifying the mask size.
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    Four channel 8-bit unsigned high-pass filter, ignoring alpha channel.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterLowPassBorder_8u_AC4R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiSize oSrcSize, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, MaskSize eMaskSize, NppiBorderType eBorderType)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSrcSize

    Source image width and height in pixels relative to pSrc.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    MaskSize eMaskSize

    Enumeration value specifying the mask size.
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterLowPassBorder_8u_C1R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, MaskSize, NppiBorderType)

    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterPrewittHorizBorder_8u_C1R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiBorderType)

    Source image width and height in pixels relative to pSrc.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterPrewittVertBorder_8u_C3R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiBorderType)

    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterRobertsDownBorder_8u_C4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiBorderType)

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterSharpenBorder_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiBorderType)

    Four channel 16-bit signed sharpening filter with border control, ignoring alpha channel.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterSharpenBorder_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiSize oSrcSize, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, NppiBorderType eBorderType)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSrcSize

    Source image width and height in pixels relative to pSrc.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    public static NppStatus nppiFilterSharpenBorder_16u_C3R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiSize oSrcSize, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, NppiBorderType eBorderType)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSrcSize

    Source image width and height in pixels relative to pSrc.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterSharpenBorder_16u_C4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, NppiBorderType)

    nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, Single, Single, Single, Single, NppiBorderType, CUdeviceptr)

    Four channel 16-bit signed unsharp filter (alpha channel is not processed).

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16s_AC4R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, float nRadius, float nSigma, float nWeight, float nThreshold, NppiBorderType eBorderType, CUdeviceptr pDeviceBuffer)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    System.Single nRadius

    The radius of the Gaussian filter, in pixles, not counting the center pixel.
    System.Single nSigma

    The standard deviation of the Gaussian filter, in pixel.
    System.Single nWeight

    The percentage of the difference between the original and the high pass image that is added back into the original.
    System.Single nThreshold

    The threshold neede to apply the difference amount.
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    CUdeviceptr pDeviceBuffer

    Pointer to the user-allocated device scratch buffer required for the unsharp operation.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16s_C1R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, Single, Single, Single, Single, NppiBorderType, CUdeviceptr)

    Single channel 16-bit signed unsharp filter.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16s_C1R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, float nRadius, float nSigma, float nWeight, float nThreshold, NppiBorderType eBorderType, CUdeviceptr pDeviceBuffer)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    System.Single nRadius

    The radius of the Gaussian filter, in pixles, not counting the center pixel.
    System.Single nSigma

    The standard deviation of the Gaussian filter, in pixel.
    System.Single nWeight

    The percentage of the difference between the original and the high pass image that is added back into the original.
    System.Single nThreshold

    The threshold neede to apply the difference amount.
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    CUdeviceptr pDeviceBuffer

    Pointer to the user-allocated device scratch buffer required for the unsharp operation.
    Returns
    Type Description

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16s_C3R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, Single, Single, Single, Single, NppiBorderType, CUdeviceptr)

    Three channel 16-bit signed unsharp filter.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16s_C3R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, float nRadius, float nSigma, float nWeight, float nThreshold, NppiBorderType eBorderType, CUdeviceptr pDeviceBuffer)

    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.

    nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16s_C4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, Single, Single, Single, Single, NppiBorderType, CUdeviceptr)

    Four channel 16-bit signed unsharp filter.

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16s_C4R(CUdeviceptr pSrc, int nSrcStep, NppiPoint oSrcOffset, CUdeviceptr pDst, int nDstStep, NppiSize oSizeROI, float nRadius, float nSigma, float nWeight, float nThreshold, NppiBorderType eBorderType, CUdeviceptr pDeviceBuffer)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    CUdeviceptr pSrc

    Source-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nSrcStep

    Source-Image Line Step.
    NppiPoint oSrcOffset

    The pixel offset that pSrc points to relative to the origin of the source image.
    CUdeviceptr pDst

    Destination-Image Pointer.
    System.Int32 nDstStep

    Destination-Image Line Step.
    NppiSize oSizeROI

    Region-of-Interest (ROI).
    System.Single nRadius

    The radius of the Gaussian filter, in pixles, not counting the center pixel.
    System.Single nSigma

    The standard deviation of the Gaussian filter, in pixel.
    System.Single nWeight

    The percentage of the difference between the original and the high pass image that is added back into the original.
    System.Single nThreshold

    The threshold neede to apply the difference amount.
    NppiBorderType eBorderType

    The border type operation to be applied at source image border boundaries.
    CUdeviceptr pDeviceBuffer

    Pointer to the user-allocated device scratch buffer required for the unsharp operation.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError, StepError, SizeError

    nppiFilterUnsharpBorder_16u_AC4R(CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiPoint, CUdeviceptr, Int32, NppiSize, Single, Single, Single, Single, NppiBorderType, CUdeviceptr)

    Four channel 32-bit floating point unsharp filter scratch memory size (alpha channel is not processed).

    Declaration
    public static NppStatus nppiFilterUnsharpGetBufferSize_32f_AC4R(float nRadius, float nSigma, ref int hpBufferSize)
    Parameters
    Type Name Description
    System.Single nRadius

    The radius of the Gaussian filter, in pixles, not counting the center pixel.
    System.Single nSigma

    The standard deviation of the Gaussian filter, in pixel.
    System.Int32 hpBufferSize

    Pointer to the size of the scratch buffer required for the unsharp operation.
    Returns
    Type Description
    NppStatus

    StepError, NotEvenStepError, NullPointerError, AlignmentError

    nppiFilterUnsharpGetBufferSize_32f_C1R(Single, Single, ref Int32)
